question: What significant historical status was granted to Jihlava, Czech Republic in 1982?
true_answer: It was declared an urban monument reservation.
asked_question_translated: Kakšen pomemben zgodovinski status je bil leta 1982 podeljen mestu Jihlava na Češkem?
answer: Mestu Jihlava na Češkem je bil leta 1982 podeljen status mestnega spomeniškega rezervata.
answer_translated_eng: The town of Jihlava in the Czech Republic was granted the status of an urban conservation area in 1982.
